page.description: Encode (to string) binary data using UUEncode scheme (64 bits).

argument.name: blob
argument.description: A blob variable containing binary data, such as read from a JPEG image file.

page.discussion: UUENCODE() creates a character string by converting the format of binary data to 7 bit ASCII. UUENCODE() and UUDECODE() are typically used to send binary files through email.
